song.title: Something Strange In The Salsa
song.info:
Not entirely sure what to classify this piece as. Perhaps trip hop, perhaps experimental, perhaps bitpop, perhaps bent and demented.
Based around a bit of a breakbeat, slowed down and whacked out... some hand drums... some bent keyboard sounds... some space cadet vocal phrases about mould growing in the salsa... misused techno sounds... a mid-section break to chiptune then back the bent theme... with an outro that's like a little musicbox gone wrong.
One of the best pieces I've ever written, and certainly among the more strange ones.
Released a single track in 2001 for the group Inflicted.
Check traxinspace for the entire disk. http://www.traxinspace.com/profile/andyabstract
